label: assemble

peekOfCode:
def create_floppy():
    log("=== CREANDO FLOPPY ===", BUILD_LOG)
    with open(FLOPPY, "wb") as f:
        f.truncate(1440 * 1024)
    with open(BOOTBIN, "rb") as src, open(FLOPPY, "r+b") as dst:
        dst.seek(0)
        dst.write(src.read())
    with open(STAGE2BIN, "rb") as src, open(FLOPPY, "r+b") as dst:
        dst.seek(512)
        data = src.read()

# --------------------------------------------------
# UTILIDADES
# --------------------------------------------------
def log(msg, logfile=None):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%H:%M:%S.%f")[:-3]
    line = f"[{timestamp}] {msg}"
    print(line)
    if logfile:
        logfile.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

    print(f"‚ïö‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïù{Colors.RESET}\n")
    if not exceptions:
        print(f"{Colors.GREEN}‚úì No se detectaron excepciones{Colors.RESET}")
        return
    print(f"{Colors.RED}Total de excepciones: {len(exceptions)}{Colors.RESET}\n")
    # Contar tipos

    """Imprimir diagn√≥stico de problemas"""
    print(f"\n{Colors.BOLD}{Colors.MAGENTA}‚ïî‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïó")
    print(f"‚ïë                    DIAGN√ìSTICO                                ‚ïë")
    print(f"‚ïö‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïù{Colors.RESET}\n")
    has_problems = False
    if patterns['triple_fault']:
        has_problems = True
        print(f"{Colors.RED}{Colors.BOLD}‚úó TRIPLE FAULT DETECTADO{Colors.RESET}")
        print(f"  {Colors.RED}El sistema est√° en un loop de excepciones{Colors.RESET}")

def main():
    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print(f"Uso: {sys.argv[0]} <qemu_log.txt>")
        print(f"\nPara generar el log de QEMU:")
        print(f"  qemu-system-i386 -drive file=portix.img,format=raw -d int,cpu_reset -D qemu_log.txt")
        sys.exit(1)
    log_file = sys.argv[1]
    print(f"{Colors.BOLD}{Colors.BLUE}")
